description: PaustianConsulting is a company that helps you maximize you coorporations Facility Management
author: Atnas - Claus Mar√≠n Kaiser

scripts.postinstall:watch: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.build: npm run html && npm run css && npm run scripts && npm run assets
scripts.html: npm run html:home && npm run html:work && npm run html:blog
scripts.css: npm run css:vendor && npm run css:minify && npm run css:autoprefix
scripts.css:minify: node-sass --include-path src src/styles.scss --output-style compressed --output src dist/styles.css
scripts.scripts: npm run scripts:minify && npm run scripts:vendor && npm run scripts:gtag
scripts.assets: npm run assets:copy && npm run icons && npm run meta
scripts.assets:copy: copyfiles -f src/assets/*.* dist/assets && copyfiles -f src/assets/partners/*.* dist/assets/partners && copyfiles -f src/assets/patterns/*.* dist/assets/patterns
scripts.icons: npm run icons:copy && npm run icons-3d:copy
scripts.meta: copyfiles -f src/meta/*.* dist/meta && copyfiles -f src/browserconfig.xml dist
scripts.watch:build: npm run html && npm run css && npm run scripts:minify
